nodes.text: Virulent Reality was a dimension that beings could occasionally escape into. Ciption Lingsnot caused concern for his parents when he sometimes escaped into Virulent Reality.

Virulent Reality was mentioned in a letter from the Lingsnots, written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that combines creature designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects with original text by Carrau. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
